content: <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/"                        xmlns:moz="http://www.mozilla.org/2006/browser/search/"> <ShortName>Zenodo</ShortName> <LongName>Zenodo</LongName> <Description>Search on Zenodo</Description> <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding> <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding> <Language>*</Language> <Contact>zenodo-admin@cern.ch</Contact> <Query role="example" searchTerms="a" /> <Developer>Powered by Invenio</Developer> <Url type="text/html" indexOffset="1" rel="results" template="/search?p={searchTerms}&jrec={startIndex}&rg={count}&ln={language}" /> <Url type="application/rss+xml" indexOffset="1" rel="results" template="/rss?p={searchTerms}&jrec={startIndex}&rg={count}&ln={language}" /> <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="/opensearchdescription" /> <moz:SearchForm></moz:SearchForm> </OpenSearchDescription>
